19 Concluding remarks: Improving Strategic Planning for Cities LED, CDS and other methodologies have become widely used in developed and developing countries for strategic-planning exer- cises. Evidence collected in this paper shows that, while the use of these approaches has been beneficial for cities, there are gaps that need to be addressed by donors and development partners to make them more efficient.
